scenario_text.value:
Oh hey, it’s Ryo and Kunemon. I wonder what
they’re up to.

Listen up, Kunemon. I’ve hidden a bunch of
empty cans like this around the grass here.

The pebbles inside them make noise when they
shake. Tell me how many there are from here.
Kewkew?

Yeah, that’s right... Raise a leg for every
can you count.
Kew!
Awright... Go for it!
Kewww...
Kewy!
Five, huh? Close! There were actually six.
Kew...

Aw, it’s cool, man. Don’t get depressed over
that.

We’re just getting started. It’s too early to
pack it in, got it? Let’s do this.
Kewww!

The more attention we pay to the area, the
faster we can deal with any dangers.

’Course we gotta get stronger too, but we
gotta be smart too if we’re gonna survive.
(Huh, looks like some kinda secret training.)
(Ryo’s full of surprises, man...)
Okay, let’s go again! I’ll reset the cans!
Kew, kewwwn!

Ah, hey! Ha ha, you can’t come with me! I’ll
be doing the hiding, so you wait there.

(I’ve never seen him laugh like that before!
He always looks like he just smelled a fart!)
That’ll do it. Awright, let’s go again...
Kewkew!

Huh? What’s wrong? There’s something behind
me?
Uh, wah! Wh-when did you get there?!

Oh no! Wh-what should I do? I’d better go get
Agumon...

No, there’s no time! I have to go help them
myself—

This ain’t good... Times like this, we gotta
get while the getting’s good!
Kewww!!!

Kunemon?! Hey, what do you think you’re
doing?! Don’t tell me...you want to fight?!
All right, then... Let’s do this thing!
Come get a piece of this! We’ll take you on!
